name: Romero Britto x DJ White Shadow

metadata.name: Lucas Vidal’s Wild Ride To The Far Side
metadata.description: “Lucas Vidal’s Wild Ride to the Far Side” is a new painting by Romero Britto. This animated NFT comes with a redeemable digital download of all ten previously unreleased musical soundscapes composed by DJ White Shadow, created specifically for this NFT collection.
